user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my everyday bras, ensuring they were suitable for all-day wear without causing discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable bra that wouldn't dig into my skin, and the soft material and cushioned underwire were appealing. However, the fit was too small, which ultimately led to my decision to return it.
Initially, I was drawn to the promise of comfort and a seamless look. The construction seemed solid, but after extended wear, I found it uncomfortable, which made me question the marketing claims.
I prioritized comfort and support, and this product delivered on both fronts. The seamless design and moisture-wicking fabric were key features that met my needs perfectly.
I was looking for a wireless bra that provided comfort without irritation. While the fabric was soft, the back clip was bothersome, which detracted from my overall satisfaction.
Comfort and support were my main priorities, and this bra met those needs effectively. The soft fabric and full coverage made it a reliable choice for everyday wear.
I wanted a bra that was both sexy and comfortable for daily use. The combination of support and style was appealing, and it exceeded my expectations in both areas.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, lightweight, and stylish, particularly in footwear and clothing. I value features such as good support, softness, and a reasonable price point. I appreciate items that fit well and are made from high-quality materials, as well as those that offer versatility in style. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that lack adequate support, fit poorly, or are made from rough materials. I also have a strong aversion to items that do not meet my expectations in terms of quality or design, especially if they are not as described or if they cause discomfort.

conversation.content: I want recommendations for everyday bras that offer comfort and support for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [12.99, 21.43]
What specific sizes are you looking for in everyday bras to ensure they provide the comfort and support you need for all-day wear?

I generally prefer everyday bras that are comfortable and supportive for all-day wear. In terms of size, I typically look for bras in the range of 36C to ensure a good fit and adequate support. What recommendations do you have in that size range?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Just My Size Women's Easy On Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1107> / Item ID: B08V8YTH95 / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Love the convenience of front-close bras? Here's one that combines front-hook ease with comfortable full support. All at an affordable price in sizes up to 54 DD!"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire速 bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex速 Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS速 presents their Pure Comfort速 wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."]
